document.full_text: lebron james's triple double was not enough to help the miami heat overcome the lowly cleveland cavaliers, who beat the playoff bound heat 102-90 on tuesday.
document.title: cavaliers negate james's triple-double to upset heat
lines_and_colors: lebron james's triple double was not enough to help the miami heat overcome the lowly cleveland cavaliers, who beat the playoff bound heat 102-90 on tuesday.
